channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:33 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 01:33 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Follow for further updates. #Kirovohrad_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 21:57 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 21:57 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:31 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 18:31 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community - Chervonohryhoriv territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
